mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `lemo_member_coupon` SET `cp_id`= #{cp_id}, `user_id`= #{user_id}, `mcp_start` = CURDATE(), `mcp_end` = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{daysAvailable} DAY), `mcp_rdate` = NOW();

INSERT INTO `lemo_member_point_detail_log` (`user_id`, `poid_content`, `poid_point`, `poid_save_id`, `poi_id`, `poid_maximum`, `poid_rdate`)
SELECT result.`user_id`, '포인트 사용' AS 'poid_content', if(result.`result` - #{poid_point} <= 0, -result.`total`, (result.`result` - result.`total`) - #{poid_point}) AS 'poid_point', result.`poid_save_id`, #{poi_id} 'poi_id', null 'poid_maximum', NOW() 'poid_rdate' FROM ( SELECT *, SUM(val.`total`) OVER(ORDER BY `poid_id`) AS 'result' FROM ( SELECT *, SUM(`poid_point`) AS 'total' FROM `lemo_member_point_detail_log` WHERE `poid_save_id` IN ( SELECT `poid_save_id`FROM `lemo_member_point_detail_log` WHERE `user_id`=#{user_id} GROUP BY `poid_save_id` HAVING SUM(`poid_point`) > 0 ) GROUP BY `poid_save_id` ) val ) result WHERE result.`total` > (result.`result`- #{poid_point}) ;

INSERT INTO lemo_member_point_log (`user_id`, `res_no`, `poi_point`, `poi_content`,`poi_maximum`, `poi_rdate`) SELECT u.`user_id`, `res_no`, if (u.`level` = 1, ROUND((`res_price`-`res_disPrice`) * 0.01), ROUND((`res_price`-`res_disPrice`) * 0.03)), '포인트 적립', DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), NOW() FROM `lemo_product_reservation` r JOIN `lemo_member_userinfo` u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE DATE(res_checkOut) = DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND r.res_state = 1;

INSERT INTO `lemo_member_point_detail_log` (`user_id`, `poid_content`, `poid_point`, `poi_id`, `poid_maximum`, `poid_rdate`) SELECT poi.`user_id`, '포인트 적립', poi.`poi_point`, poi.poi_id, poi.`poi_maximum`, NOW() FROM `lemo_member_point_log` poi JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` r ON poi.res_no = r.res_no WHERE DATE(r.res_checkOut) = DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND r.res_state = 1 AND poi.poi_content = '포인트 적립';
mapper.update: UPDATE `lemo_member_point_detail_log` SET `poid_save_id`=`poid_id` WHERE `poid_content`='포인트 적립' AND `poid_save_id` IS NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `lemo_member_point_log` (`user_id`, `poi_point`, `poi_content`, `poi_maximum`, `poi_rdate`) SELECT poi.`user_id`, -SUM(poid_sub.poid_point), '포인트 만료', poi.poi_maximum, NOW() FROM `lemo_member_point_log` poi JOIN `lemo_member_point_detail_log` poid ON poi.poi_id = poid.poi_id JOIN `lemo_member_point_detail_log` poid_sub ON poid.poid_id = poid_sub.poid_save_id GROUP BY poid_sub.`poid_save_id` HAVING SUM(poid_sub.poid_point) > 0 AND poi.poi_maximum < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');

INSERT INTO `lemo_member_point_detail_log` (`user_id`, `poid_content`, `poid_point`, `poid_save_id`, `poi_id`, `poid_maximum`, `poid_rdate`) SELECT val.`user_id`, '포인트 만료' AS 'poid_content', -val.`sum` AS 'poid_point', val.`poid_save_id`, val.`poi_id`, val.`poid_maximum`, NOW() FROM ( SELECT *, SUM(`poid_point`) AS 'sum' FROM `lemo_member_point_detail_log` GROUP BY `poid_save_id` HAVING SUM(`poid_point`) != 0 AND `poid_maximum` < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') ) val;
mapper.update: UPDATE `lemo_member_userinfo` user LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `user_id`, SUM(`poid_point`) AS 'total' FROM `lemo_member_point_detail_log` GROUP BY `user_id` ) log ON user.user_id = log.user_id SET user.`point` = IFNULL(log.`total`, 0);
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, t.accType_type, c.rp_offSeason_weekday, c.rp_offSeason_weekend, c.rp_peakSeason_weekday, c.rp_peakSeason_weekend
LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
SELECT Count(a.acc_id)

SELECT a.*, r.*, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock',c.* FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a
JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id', (r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > #{checkIn} AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < #{checkOut})
GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE a.acc_id = #{acc_id} and r.room_state = 1 ORDER BY a.acc_id;
SELECT a.*, b.`sc_name` FROM `lemo_product_servicereginfo` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_servicecate` AS b ON a.sc_no = b.sc_no WHERE `acc_id`= #{acc_id}
SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_businessinfo` WHERE `user_id` = #{user_id};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `lemo_product_pick` WHERE `acc_id` = #{acc_id} AND `user_id` = #{user_id};

SELECT a.*, b.acc_id, c.acc_name FROM `lemo_diary_article` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS c ON b.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE b.`acc_id` = #{acc_id} ORDER BY a.`arti_rdate` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
ORDER BY `revi_id` DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
SELECT b.* FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a JOIN `lemo_member_userinfo` AS b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE acc_id = #{acc_id}

SELECT a.*, b.mcp_id FROM `lemo_product_coupon` AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_coupon` WHERE `user_id`=#{user_id}) AS b ON a.`cp_id` = b.`cp_id` WHERE ( `acc_id`= #{acc_id} OR `cp_group` = 'ALL' OR (`cp_group` = 'acc_province' AND `cp_type`= #{province_no}) OR (`cp_group` = 'acc_type' AND `cp_type`=#{accType_no}))
AND CURDATE() <= `cp_end`
SELECT a.*, b.mcp_id FROM (SELECT * FROM `lemo_product_coupon` WHERE `cp_id`=#{cp_id}) AS a left JOIN (SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_coupon` WHERE `user_id`=#{user_id}) AS b ON a.`cp_id` = b.`cp_id`
SELECT count(`arti_no`) FROM `lemo_diary_article` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no WHERE `acc_id` = #{acc_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `lemo_product_review` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON c.room_id = b.room_id WHERE b.acc_id = #{acc_id}

SELECT *, IFNULL(`room_checkIn`, acc_checkIn) AS `checkInTime`, IFNULL(`room_checkOut`, acc_checkOut) AS `checkOutTime` FROM `lemo_product_room` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` AS c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE `room_id`= #{room_id}
SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_terms` AS a JOIN `lemo_member_termstype` AS b ON a.termsType_no = b.termsType_no WHERE b.termsType_no = #{termsType_no}
SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_userinfo` WHERE `user_id` = #{user_id};
SELECT COUNT(`res_no`) FROM `lemo_product_reservation` WHERE `user_id`= #{user_id} AND `res_no`= #{res_no}

SELECT a.*,b.acc_name,c.room_name, IFNULL(`room_checkIn`, acc_checkIn) AS `room_checkIn`, IFNULL(`room_checkOut`, acc_checkOut) AS `room_checkOut`, IFNULL(d.`poi_point`, 0) AS `poi_point`, IFNULL(e.`dis_price`, 0) AS `cp_disprice` FROM `lemo_product_reservation` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON a.room_id = c.`room_id` LEFT JOIN `lemo_member_point_log` AS d ON a.res_no = d.res_no LEFT JOIN `lemo_member_coupon_log` AS e ON a.res_no = e.res_no WHERE a.`res_no`=#{res_no} AND (d.poi_content IS NULL OR d.poi_content IN ('포인트 사용'));
mapper.update: UPDATE `lemo_product_accommodation` acc JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id, AVG(r.revi_rate) 'acc_rate' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` res ON a.acc_id = res.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_review` r ON res.res_no = r.res_no GROUP BY a.acc_id ) vals ON acc.acc_id = vals.acc_id SET acc.acc_rate = TRUNCATE(vals.acc_rate ,1);
UPDATE `lemo_product_reservation` SET `res_state` = 2 WHERE `res_state` = 1 AND DATE(`res_checkOut`) = DATE(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
mapper.sql: SELECT a.*, b.acc_id, b.res_checkIn, b.res_no, c.room_name, d.acc_review, d.acc_rate,e.photo FROM `lemo_product_review` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON c.room_id = b.room_id JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS d ON b.acc_id = d.acc_id JOIN `lemo_member_userinfo` AS e ON e.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.acc_id = #{acc_id}

FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY a.room_price, IFNULL(a.empty_room_stock, a.room_stock) desc) 'order' FROM( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', a.user_id, a.acc_name, a.accType_no, a.province_no, a.acc_city, a.acc_zip, a.acc_addr,a.acc_addrDetail, a.acc_longtitude, a.acc_lattitude, a.acc_xy, a.acc_mainInfo, a.acc_info, a.acc_comment, a.acc_thumbs, a.acc_rate, a.acc_review, a.acc_season,a.acc_state, r.room_maxNum 'room_maxNum', r.room_id, r.room_price 'room_price', r.room_stock 'room_stock', r.room_thumb, r.room_name,r.room_addPrice,r.room_info,r.room_checkIn, r.room_checkOut, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY r.room_price, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) desc) 'top', SUM(IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock)) OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id) 'sum_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id', (r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id
WHERE AND r.room_state = 1
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > DATE(NOW()) AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > #{checkIn} AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < #{checkOut})
GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id
WHERE AND r.room_state = 1
ORDER BY a.acc_id) a WHERE (a.empty_room_stock != 0 OR (a.sum_room_stock = 0 AND a.top = 1))
AND a.room_maxNum > #{headcount}
) a
JOIN `lemo_product_accommodationtype` t ON a.accType_no = t.accType_no LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id
WHERE a.order = 1 AND a.acc_state = 1
AND a.`accType_no` In(${accTypes})
AND (a.`room_price` BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice})
